trans-unit.source: Addressing Table Service Resources
trans-unit.target: Addressing Table Service Resources

trans-unit.source: The Table service exposes the following resources via the REST API:
trans-unit.target: The Table service exposes the following resources via the REST API:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Account.</embeddedLabel> The storage account is a uniquely identified entity within the storage system.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Account.</embeddedLabel> The storage account is a uniquely identified entity within the storage system.

trans-unit.source: The storage account is the parent namespace for the Table service.
trans-unit.target: The storage account is the parent namespace for the Table service.

trans-unit.source: All tables are associated with an account.
trans-unit.target: All tables are associated with an account.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Tables.</embeddedLabel> The Tables resource represents the set of tables within a given storage account.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Tables.</embeddedLabel> The Tables resource represents the set of tables within a given storage account.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Entity.</embeddedLabel> An individual table stores data as a collection of entities.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Entity.</embeddedLabel> An individual table stores data as a collection of entities.

trans-unit.source: Resource URI Syntax
trans-unit.target: Resource URI Syntax

trans-unit.source: The base URI for Table service resources is the storage account:
trans-unit.target: The base URI for Table service resources is the storage account:

trans-unit.source: To list the tables in a given storage account, to create a new table, or to delete a table, refer to the set of tables in the specified storage account:
trans-unit.target: To list the tables in a given storage account, to create a new table, or to delete a table, refer to the set of tables in the specified storage account:

trans-unit.source: To return a single table, name that table within the Tables collection, as follows:
trans-unit.target: To return a single table, name that table within the Tables collection, as follows:

trans-unit.source: To query entities in a table, or to insert, update, or delete an entity, refer to that table directly within the storage account.
trans-unit.target: To query entities in a table, or to insert, update, or delete an entity, refer to that table directly within the storage account.

trans-unit.source: This basic syntax refers to the set of all entities in the named table:
trans-unit.target: This basic syntax refers to the set of all entities in the named table:

trans-unit.source: The format for addressing data resources for queries conforms to that specified by the <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol Specification</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The format for addressing data resources for queries conforms to that specified by the <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol Specification</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this syntax to filter entities based on criteria specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: You can use this syntax to filter entities based on criteria specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Note that all values for query parameters must be URL encoded before they are sent to the Azure storage services.
trans-unit.target: Note that all values for query parameters must be URL encoded before they are sent to the Azure storage services.

trans-unit.source: Supported HTTP Operations
trans-unit.target: Supported HTTP Operations

trans-unit.source: Each resource supports operations based on the HTTP verbs GET, PUT, HEAD, and DELETE.
trans-unit.target: Each resource supports operations based on the HTTP verbs GET, PUT, HEAD, and DELETE.

trans-unit.source: The verb, syntax, and supported HTTP version(s) for each operation appears on the reference page for each operation.
trans-unit.target: The verb, syntax, and supported HTTP version(s) for each operation appears on the reference page for each operation.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of operation reference pages, see <link xlink:href="8e8a98bc-9cd0-42c2-b0aa-be6a4065c35c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Service REST API</link>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of operation reference pages, see <link xlink:href="8e8a98bc-9cd0-42c2-b0aa-be6a4065c35c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Service REST API</link>.
